body.name: Monoprice 50ft 16AWG CL2 Rated 2-Conductor Loud Speaker Cable (For In-Wall Installation)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 4 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 50 continuous feet of 16AWG 2-conductor speaker Wire | on a spool
The white outer jacket is CL2 rated, making it safe for use within the walls of residential class buildings
Each conductor has an individual, color-coded jacket enclosed within the outer white CL2 jacket
body.description: Get the most out of your home audio system with high quality oxygen-free copper speaker wire from Monoprice!. This wire features two conductors made of high purity (greater than 99. 95% pure) oxygen-free copper. Each conductor is jacketed with color-coded PVC for easy polarity identification. The entire cable assembly is jacketed in a white CL2-rated PVC material. The CL2 rating indicates that the cable complies with fire safety and insurance requirements making it safe for use inside the walls of residential class buildings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I'm very happy with this wire. Very easy to pull, easy to route, very easy to strip and has a stripping cord. Speakers sound great. Would recommend and will buy again

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality cable
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper on Amazon. I used all of 100ft for my setup. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply amazing quality & price!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent pure copper, oxygen free speaker wire at a great price! While this wire was specifically made (& rated) for "in wall" use, I find that it's amazing for running under the carpet and along baseboards, as well as up the wall. I'm currently living in an apartment until our house is finished, and this wire is excellent as it blends into the wall and makes it much less of an eyesore, compared to standard copper colored speaker wire. As you can see in my photos, it blends in nicely when connected to my surround sound speakers. (It does have light black writing on the white outside casing, but its actually pretty easy to rub off, to make it look much cleaner)Being 14 gauge is great as well, though you'll want to make sure you strip & twist the wires correctly as it's a very tight fit if you have spring loaded speaker connections, and they can be a little tight when connecting them to banana plugs. That said, the positive & negative color coding is great. I really can't say enough great things about this wire. It's extremely high quality and Monoprice hit it out of the park with pricing. If you're looking for great high quality speaker wire, Monoprice is the way to go. Don't be fooled by the "scary monsters" out there, with their extremely overpriced wires & cables... Monoprice will have you rockin & rollin with their amazing quality & pricing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, good value, copper strands do not fray when twisted
reviews.reviewText: I am using this speaker wire in walls and my ceiling with the following speakers and receiver: ELAC - Debut F5 Tower Speakers (Each) ELAC B5 Debut Series 5.25" Bookshelf Speakers by Andrew Jones (Pair) ELAC C5 Debut Series 5.25" Center Speaker by Andrew Jones Micca M-8C 8 Inch 2-Way In-Ceiling In-Wall Speaker with Pivoting 1" Silk Dome Tweeter (Each, White) (for Dolby Atmos) Yamaha RX-V583BL 7.2-Channel 4K Ultra HD MusicCast AV Receiver I am using Mediabridge Banana Plugs - Corrosion-Resistant 24K Gold-Plated Connectors - 12 Pair/24 Banana Plugs (Part# SPC-BP2-12 ) to connect everything together. I am getting great sound everywhere. I had this same Monoprice in-wall speaker wire in my old house, 16 gauge instead of 14 at the time, and it worked great for years there, too.This speaker wire is a good value and the copper strands twist together without fraying. I purchased speaker wire from Belkin once that frayed all over the place when trying to twist the copper strands together tightly. This wire is a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This speaker wire seems very high quality. It is very stiff though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2013
reviews.reviewText: These might not be fancy, but they have unbeatable practical quality and a great price. If you need speaker cable, give this one strong consideration.A few features that make this cable worth every penny:- All-copper conductors- Low strand count = thick, durable strands- Color-coded inner jackets- Length markers on the outer jacket at each foot- Rated for in-wall installationThe 14 ga. notch on my wire strippers made a clean cut on the inner jackets without breaking any of the strands, so the wire diameter is perfect. The outer jacket is loose and doesn't have the appearance of a precisely manufactured product, but it works to your advantage because it doesn't restrict the inner wires during installation. So, I see no reason to complain.If you live in the Western U.S., you can buy this cable direct from Monoprice for cheaper. If you are located in the Eastern U.S. and have Prime, you can pay about the same and get it from Amazon much sooner. It's a great price either way. Expensive cables impress no one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cable - All Copper!! - some competitors are Coper Clad Aluminum (CCA)
reviews.reviewText: I'm extremely happy with the flexibility and ease of handling while wiring my home theater. I wasn't sure exactly how much wire I needed, but I figured a long roll would help avoid any splicing of annoying left-overs from buying two shorter rolls.
Great quality, in-wall rated. Will purchase more in the future.

Los conecte en este bafle para dos subwoofer de 15 pulgadas antes los tenía conectados con cable del 12 y cuando les puse este cable del #14 se escuchó la diferencia ,es un buen cable 99% cobre, exelente calidad -precio
